title: Cool creatures : reptiles
brief_description: This video examines reptiles, noting their characteristics, major groups, kinds and interesting traits of reptiles, both extinct and in existence today. Reptiles identified and discussed are: turles, lizards, snakes, crocodiles, alligators, gharials and ciamans. Different reptile habitats are explored, along with the reptile’s mechanisms for survival. Suitable for Primary level students.
